posts.title: First Post
posts.text: Hi! I'm Clara, a backend developer sharing my journey.

posts.title: Learning Rust
posts.text: Trying out Rust for systems programming. Loving the safety features!

posts.title: Reply to Bob
posts.text: Your weather app idea sounds awesome, Bob!

posts.title: Database Optimization
posts.text: Indexes can drastically speed up queries. Use them wisely.

posts.title: Reply to Alice
posts.text: I also recommend 'The Pragmatic Programmer' — great read!

posts.title: Docker Tip
posts.text: Use multi-stage builds to keep your images small.

posts.title: Reply to Myself
posts.text: Also, Alpine-based images can reduce size even more.

posts.title: Unit Testing
posts.text: Write tests before you refactor — it saves headaches.

posts.title: Reply to Bob Again
posts.text: Async/await in JS really does make code cleaner.

posts.title: Signing Off
posts.text: That’s it for today. Keep learning!
